price: 82. y Quien espero con anhelo que perdone mis faltas el Día del Juicio Final”.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡمَعُ أَن يَغۡفِرَ لِي خَطِيٓـَٔتِي يَوۡمَ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī aṭmaʿu an yaghfira lī khaṭīatī yawma al-dīni
